thread.title: W Taipei extends weekend getaway series till September - “Shock Wave ALOHA Pool Party” & “Shock Wave Room Package”
thread.title_full: W Taipei extends weekend getaway series till September - “Shock Wave ALOHA Pool Party” & “Shock Wave Room Package”

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: W Taipei extends weekend getaway series till September - “Shock Wave ALOHA Pool Party” & “Shock Wave Room Package”
text:
W Taipei extends weekend getaway series till September - “Shock Wave ALOHA Pool Party” & “Shock Wave Room Package” W Taipei extends weekend getaway series till September - “Shock Wave ALOHA Pool Party” & “Shock Wave Room Package” Details Category: Hotel   15:15 This September is all about Hawaii. Just come to WET Deck of W Taipei and cool down at the “Shock Wave Aloha Pool Party” or crash in one of our Wonderful rooms, relaxing in our fabulous “W Bed” and enjoying the party fun and music vibe with our “Shock Wave Room Package” at W Taipei! From September 6th till 27th, “Shock Wave Aloha Pool Party” offers Aloha drinks, tropical canapé, soothing and relaxing music vibes and a chance to win “Taipei to Hawaii” round-trip fly tickets per any TWD2,000 consumption at WET Bar brought by Hawaii Tourism Taiwan. 
“Celebrating summer is a ritual at the W Hotels.” shared W Taipei General Manager Cary Michael Gray. “This year, we want to extend summertime to September with a more luxurious and sensual experience with WET outdoor pool, W DJ live music, and refreshing summer cocktails,” “For those who need to get away, alone or with the loved ones, Shock Wave Room Package is the choice. You don’t have to fly all the way to an isolated island, simply check into W Taipei and enjoy the escape.” “Shock Wave Aloha Pool Party” is on every sunny Sunday from September 6th to September 27th from 14:00- 19:00. Entrance fee priced at TWD800 per person. Guests who come to the party can use WET swimming pool, enjoy one complimentary refreshing ALOHA drinks, tropical canapé, the exotic Hula dance performance, W Taipei Music Curator Sona Eyambe, DeeJay RayRay, and other talented W DJs playing live gig on the soothing Sunday afternoon, and have a chance to win “Taipei to Hawaii” round-trip fly tickets per any TWD2,000 consumption at WET Bar. For more information please visit: www.wtaipei.com/shockwave Why go home when you can enjoy summer like no others? Check in to our “Shock Wave Room Package”, while you can wind down in the Shock Wave Pool Party on sunny Sunday afternoon, or simply stay in W Bed and relax. The “Shock Wave Room Package” is priced from TWD9,900+10%+5% onwards and is valid from now until September 27th, 2015. Guests can enjoy the following abundant benefits for two: one night stay in a Wonderful Room (original price at TWD20,000 per night), one time free access to Shock Wave Aloha Pool Party, Cocktail Ice Pops, the exculsive15% off for “The Sandwich Club” Combo at WOOBAR and the daily buffet breakfast at the kitchen table. All SPG members can use WIFI for free during stay, and all in house guests have the privilege to use FIT (gym), WET (swimming pool), Jacuzzi and steam in the Change Rooms of our AWAY SPA.
